original_title: Los caballeros del botón de ancla
overview: Carlos, Enrique and Jose Luis are three great friends, students of the Naval School of Marín. Future marine have to test their loyalty when love enters their lives ... Remake of a film's own Ramón Torrado, 1948 entitled "Botón de Ancla" and that he had met in 1960-another adaptation of the same novel, starring the Dynamic Duo.
title: Los caballeros del botón de ancla
